Subsection.title: Overview
Subsection.Paragraph: The com.io7m.montarre.app_image packager creates jpackage "app image" executables.

Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: The com.io7m.montarre.app_image packager takes a montarre package and produces a platform-specific app image distribution using the jpackage tool.
The output of the com.io7m.montarre.app_image packager is typically used as input to other platform-specific packagers such as com.io7m.montarre.deb and com.io7m.montarre.msi, amongst others.
